A lot of times Coach talks about me beating guys down the court, and when I had the ball tonight, that wasn't the case, Allen Iverson said.`` They were beating me down the court, and I was just finding guys. Press MUNCIE, Ind.-- U.S. Rep. Mike Pence discussed his political future-- in somewhat nonspecific terms-- while addressing students in a Central High School social studies class Friday. Mike Pence acknowledged he was considering maybe coming home and running for governor, but the Republican said he was likely months away from making a final decision.
